ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] OT - Final Fantasy X
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I played FF7 actually on the Playstation, ports do tend to be a dubious thing. ... Civ 3 is a waste of time...it has fewer features than Alpha Centauri or
ygData.messageBody:
--- Daniel Sniderman <fuzzbone@...> wrote:
> Most Console ports to PC's keep that console look-and-feel - and the FF
> games especially so. If you don't care for that type of game - it's not
> going to do much for you...

I played FF7 actually on the Playstation, ports do tend to be a dubious
thing.

> Personally, I play EQ so much - that there's no point to buy other games.
> I
> have Civ3 on my hard disk. Civ 1 and 2 were my favorite games of all time.
> I stayed up all night playing them. I've never gotten a Civ3 game out of
> the medieval era...

Civ 3 is a waste of time...it has fewer features than Alpha Centauri or Call
to Power...hell, it even lacks many features present in Civ 2. They're too
obsessed with improving the /graphics/, not enough with the actual game.

=====
